verses.verse: Then came<WH935> certain<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> unto me<WH3427>, and sat before me<WH6440>.

Therefore speak<WH1696> unto them<WH559>, and say unto them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Every man<WH376> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> that taketh<WH5927> his idols<WH1544> into his heart<WH3820>, and putteth<WH7760> the stumblingblock<WH4383> of his iniquity<WH5771> before<WH5227> his face<WH6440>, and cometh<WH935> to the prophet<WH5030>; I Jehovah<WH3068> will answer<WH6030> him therein<WH935> according to the multitude<WH7230> of his idols<WH1544>;
that I may take<WH8610> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> in their own heart<WH3820>, because they are all estranged<WH2114> from me through their idols<WH1544>.

Therefore say<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Return<WH7725> ye<WH7725>, and turn yourselves from your idols<WH1544>; and turn away<WH7725> your faces<WH6440> from all your abominations<WH8441>.

For every one<WH376> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, or of the strangers<WH1616> that sojourn<WH1481> in Israel<WH3478>, that separateth<WH5144> himself from me<WH310>, and taketh<WH5927> his idols<WH1544> into his heart<WH3820>, and putteth<WH7760> the stumblingblock<WH4383> of his iniquity<WH5771> before<WH5227> his face<WH6440>, and cometh<WH935> to the prophet<WH5030> to inquire<WH1875> for himself of me<WH3068>; I Jehovah will answer him by myself<WH6030>:

and I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against that man<WH376>, and will make<WH8074> him an astonishment<WH226>, for a sign and a proverb<WH4912>, and I will cut him off<WH3772> from the midst<WH8432> of my people<WH5971>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

And if the prophet<WH5030> be deceived<WH6601> and speak<WH1696> a word<WH1697>, I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have deceived<WH6601> that prophet<WH5030>, and I will stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> upon him<WH8045>, and will destroy him from the midst<WH8432> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>.
And they shall bear<WH5375> their iniquity<WH5771>: the iniquity<WH5771> of the prophet<WH5030> shall be even as the iniquity<WH5771> of him that seeketh unto him<WH1875>;

that the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> may go no more astray<WH8582> from me<WH310>, neither defile<WH2930> themselves any more with all their transgressions<WH6588>; but that they may be my people<WH5971>, and I may be their God<WH430>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, when a land<WH776> sinneth<WH2398> against me by committing<WH4604> a trespass<WH4603>, and I stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> upon it<WH7665>, and break the staff<WH4294> of the bread<WH3899> thereof<WH7971>, and send famine<WH7458> upon it<WH3772>, and cut off from it man<WH120> and beast<WH929>;

though these three<WH7969> men<WH582>, Noah<WH5146>, Daniel<WH1840>, and Job<WH347>, were in it<WH8432>, they should deliver<WH5337> but their own souls<WH5315> by their righteousness<WH6666>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

If <WH3863> I cause evil<WH7451> beasts<WH2416> to pass through<WH5674> the land<WH776>, and they ravage<WH7921> it<WH8077>, and it be made desolate, so that no man may pass through<WH5674> because<WH6440> of the beasts<WH2416>;

though these three<WH7969> men<WH582> were in it<WH8432>, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, they should deliver<WH5337> neither sons<WH1121> nor daughters<WH1323>; they only should be delivered<WH5337>, but the land<WH776> should be desolate<WH8077>.
Or if I bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon that land<WH776>, and say<WH559>, Sword<WH2719>, go through<WH5674> the land<WH776>; so that I cut off<WH3772> from it man<WH120> and beast<WH929>;

though these three<WH7969> men<WH582> were in it<WH8432>, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, they should deliver<WH5337> neither sons<WH1121> nor daughters<WH1323>, but they only should be delivered themselves<WH5337>.
Or if I send<WH7971> a pestilence<WH1698> into that land<WH776>, and pour out<WH8210> my wrath<WH2534> upon it in blood<WH1818>, to cut off<WH3772> from it man<WH120> and beast<WH929>;

though Noah<WH5146>, Daniel<WH1840>, and Job<WH347>, were in it<WH8432>, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, they should deliver<WH5337> neither son<WH1121> nor<WH518> daughter<WH1323>; they should but deliver<WH5337> their own souls<WH5315> by their righteousness<WH6666>.

For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: How much more when I send<WH7971> my four<WH702> sore<WH7451> judgments<WH8201> upon Jerusalem<WH3389>, the sword<WH2719>, and the famine<WH7458>, and the evil<WH7451> beasts<WH2416>, and the pestilence<WH1698>, to cut off<WH3772> from it man<WH120> and beast<WH929>!

Yet <WH3498>, behold, therein shall be left a remnant<WH6413> that shall be carried forth<WH3318>, both sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>: behold<WH3318>, they shall come forth unto you<WH7200>, and ye shall see their way<WH1870> and their doings<WH5949>; and ye shall be comforted<WH5162> concerning the evil<WH7451> that I have brought<WH935> upon Jerusalem<WH3389>, even concerning all that I have brought upon it<WH935>.

And they shall comfort<WH5162> you<WH7200>, when ye see their way<WH1870> and their doings<WH5949>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I have not done<WH6213> without cause<WH2600> all that I have done<WH6213> in it<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
